events.name: PostCreated
events.description: Triggered when a new post is created in the system.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: Occurs when a post is modified.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: Indicates that a post is removed from the system.

events.name: PostPublished
events.description: Occurs when a post is published and made public.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: Triggered when a new post is created in the system.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: Occurs when a post is modified.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: Indicates that a post is removed from the system.

commands.name: PublishPost
commands.description: Occurs when a post is published and made public.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration for user authentication and permissions related to posts.

integrationPoints.name: ContentDeliveryNetwork
integrationPoints.description: Integration to serve images and media associated with posts.
